title: Corporate Restructuring
description: This course seeks to give students an understanding of issues in corporate restructuring. Topics include valuation, mergers, acquisitions, spin-offs, financial distress, corporate governance, and high leveraged transactions.  The valuation techniques recquire students  to develop forecasting skills and evaluate transactions using analytical and statistical tools.
